additional_titles.title: GA 芸術科アートデザインクラス

plots.content: * Based on Kiyuzuki Satoko's slice-of-life manga series serialised in Comic Gyutto! and later Manga Time Kirara Carat.The ongoing GA: Geijutsuka Art Design Class manga series premiered in 2004, illustrating the daily lives of five freshman girls in a high school art class.
A slice-of-life anime that revolves around five freshman girls in a high school art class.

GA is a class that specializes in the arts at Ayanoi High School. Kisaragi, Nodamiki, Kyoju, Tomokane and Namiko are a group of five friends who have colorful adventures and learn about art techniques.
